attributes.action: Alcohol tax to go to the NHS staff following  the C19 pandemic when pubs open!
attributes.additional_details: Pretty self explanatory really.... ALL NHS staff & key workers deserve a pay rise and a reward for their selfless acts during the pandemic.
attributes.background: Divert all alcohol tax to NHS staff and key workers who have sacrificed their lives to stop the pandemic. When the pubs open there will be an astronomical increase in alcohol sales. Taxes should be diverted to ALL NHS staff and key workers. Let’s reward their sacrifice and bravery.
